reviews.text: First, this is Zigong. You are in the middle of China. During my two days in this town I never saw another foreigner. Supposedly this hotel has strong links to the government the plus side is that the service is very good. Many of the people working in the hotel speak good english and have helpful suggestions. There are two things that would have made this hotel better.
reviews.title: Cheap option, not luxurious

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Canadian Couple

reviews.text: 2) provide bar soap rather than body wash in the room.
reviews.title: This hotel is OK
